specializations: Skin, scalp, oral, and gut health
notes: Symrise is a major global player offering the SymProBiome™ platform, a comprehensive microbiome research platform for skin, scalp, oral cavity, and gut health. Portfolio includes microbiome-friendly preservatives, microbiome-safe UV filters, and various specialized products like SymReboot® L19, SymDeo® B125, Frescolat® ML, Crinipan® PMC Green, SymGuard® CD, and SymReboot® OC. Leading innovation in microbiome science with extensive research capabilities.
